text: CLOSE In'Coco,'Miguel's dream of becoming a musician comes true. It's a night in the Land of the Dead that gives him the opportunity to prove his talent! USA TODAY Miguel ( voiced by Anthony Gonzalez ) plays his music in secret in Pixar's animated'Coco.'( Photo : Pixar ) As Pixar delves more into sequel territory ( looking at you, Cars 3 and Finding Dory ), here comes an animated fiesta that reminds just how good those folks are with originality.
